text: R. Chinnammal (80) and her son R. Eswaran (44) allegedly committed suicide by hanging in their house at Koilpalayam near here on Friday. Eswaran, who worked in a textile unit, was also involved in farming activities. According to police sources, Eswaran was not married and this reportedly had worried him and his mother for the past many days.
title: Elderly woman, son commit suicide
